income_messages:
From: m************1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-23 16:14:59
SUBJECT:   Dear We are offering Corpora
  Dear We are offering Corporate and Personal Loan at 3% Interest Rate for a duration of 15 years.We also pay 1% commission to brokers who introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities
Yours faithfully,
Moussa Ahmed.
Director.
Website: https:/ /www.internationalwc.com   
From: m************1@gmail.com
To: ea71954@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-27 00:14:24
SUBJECT: Re: Dear We are offering Corpora
Dear Ms. Betty Morgan,
Sir,
We are ALI SHAREEF AL-EMADI INVESTMENTS & LOAN Company affiliated to our
parent company, which is international wealth consults with a registered
address in the State of Bahrain.
We are independent financial advisors offering high quality and independent
financial services for the gulf region residents and expatriates living
abroad, we also provide a broad range of services to both commercial and
private clients. As a major Bahrain loan firm, we serve local, regional,
national and international clients.
At this point we only specialized in providing Loans at a 3% interest rate
for the duration of 15 years.  We are capable of handling any kind of
project hence it’s not over our limit/Maximum funding.
Our terms and conditions:
1. Our Minimum Funding: U$1 Million and our Maximum Funding is: U$3.5
Billion
2. INVESTMENT PERIOD: - 10 to 15 Years + 2 years Grace Period.
3. Interest Rate Per Annum: - 3% per annum interest
 4. Capital Repayment Period: - balloon payment at the end of the 10 or
15-year period.
5. Interest Payment: - At the end of each year starting after the Grace
Period of Two Years.
 6. Grace Period: - Minimum of 24 Months, which will be the Construction
Period.
7. Security/Guarantee.: - Insurance Credit Wrap/ Insurance Surety Bond.
Customers are required to procure an insurance security wrap with our
issuer, which will serve as the only security to the funds we are given out
hence he or she does not reside or operate from the gulf region.
We also pay 1.2% commission to brokers who introduce project owners for
finance or other opportunities.
To enable us to proceed kindly provide us with your business plan or an
executive summary for our review verification and approval.
Thanks for your understanding and cooperation, I will be waiting for your
kind response.
Yours faithfully,
Mr. Moussa Ahmed.
Telephone: +97336143718
http://www.internationalwc.com
International Wealth Consult
From: m************1@gmail.com
To: ea71954@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-28 12:17:14
SUBJECT: Re: Dear We are offering Corpora
Dear Ms. Betty Morgan,
Ma,
We choose you because of the cash scarcity all over the world due the
effect of the covid-19 pandemic that has ravaged every business on this
planet earth. We are out there helping businesses and investors to
rejuvenate their businesses that were ravaged.
To enable us to proceed kindly provide us with your business plan or an
executive summary for our review verification and approval.
Thanks for your understanding and cooperation, I will be waiting for your
kind response.
Yours faithfully,
Mr. Moussa Ahmed.
Telephone: +97336143718
http://www.internationalwc.com
International Wealth Consult
